original_text: You sold the people of Judah and Jerusalem to the Greeks, that you might send them far from their homeland.
korean_text: 또 유다 자손과 예루살렘 자손들을 헬라 족속에게 팔아서 그들의 영토에서 멀리 떠나게 하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: You sold the people of Judah and Jerusalem
that you might send them far from their homeland
